text.name: froggy
text.description: Well done, you have completed the game!

text.name: rateau
text.description: A rake is a gardening tool used for raking dead leaves or grass.

text.name: arrosoir
text.description: A watering can is a container with a handle and a spout, used for watering plants.

text.name: solaire
text.description: Solar energy is produced from sunlight, captured by solar panels to generate electricity.

text.name: eolienne
text.description: Wind energy is produced by the force of the wind and captured by wind turbines to generate electricity.

text.name: hydraulique
text.description: Hydraulic energy is produced by the force of moving water, used in hydroelectric dams to generate electricity.

text.name: biomasse
text.description: Biomass is energy produced from organic matter, such as wood, agricultural waste, and urban waste, transformed into fuel or biogas.

text.name: geothermique
text.description: Geothermal energy is produced by the heat of the Earth, harnessed through geothermal power plants to produce heat or electricity.

text.name: seau
text.description: A bucket is a useful container for carrying water, collecting garden waste, storing tools, and gathering harvests.

text.name: fourche
text.description: A pitchfork is a tool with prongs used for aerating soil, breaking up clumps, and uprooting weeds in the garden.

text.name: balai
text.description: A leaf broom is a tool used to gather and clean up dead leaves, debris, and other garden litter, thus facilitating the maintenance of a clean and orderly outdoor space.

text.name: feuilles_mortes
text.description: Dead leaves are a valuable source of organic matter for composting, providing essential nutrients and promoting soil health in the garden.

text.name: laitue
text.description: Lettuce is a leafy green plant often used as a base for salads. It is rich in fiber, vitamins, and minerals, making it an excellent addition to a balanced diet.

text.name: tomate
text.description: The tomato is a red and juicy fruit found in gardens. It can be eaten raw in salads or cooked in sauces and soups.
